name: Dash Titans
description:
NEW EASTER UPDATE - TWO UPDATES IN ONE!

11 new easter-themed characters to play with!

Plus an additional 15 characters from the "Farming & Wizardry" on android.

Journey into the endless forest and test your skills in combat.

Play as a variety of titans and defeat warriors, archers and mages.

Collect gems and XP to grow and expand your dashing arsenal of titans!

Each Titan has their own abilities, which one will you go for? The fearless stunt pig? a mighty dragonslayer? or a fierce archer? It's up to you!
